mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.cart_amount, c.u_id, p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_stock, p.p_seller FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.p_id = p.p_id JOIN users u ON c.u_id = u.u_id WHERE c.u_id = #{uId} ORDER BY c.cart_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (u_id, p_id, cart_amount) VALUES (#{uId}, #{pId}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cart_amount = cart_amount + 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND u_id = #{uId}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p.p_price * c.cart_amount), 0) as total_price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.p_id = p.p_id WHERE c.u_id = #{uId}
